text: @Acosta God, is @PressSec truly this dim? Fiest, many states have no-fault mail-in voting, if you don’t know. And it’s not politicizing coronavirus to allow people to vote by mail. Oh - and it’s a “Democratic” plan, not “Democrat” plan.
